patthana21.26:1.1: Nahetuṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.26:2.1: Nahetuṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.26:3.1: Nahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
